subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Cammalleri and Lubomir Visnovsky scored during regulation and the host Los Angeles Kings had shootout goals from Anze Kopitar and Alexander Frolov to beat the Devils, 3-2, last night.
snippet: Mike Cammalleri and Lubomir Visnovsky scored during regulation and the host Los Angeles Kings had shootout goals from Anze Kopitar and Alexander Frolov to beat the Devils, 3-2, last night.
